cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 3 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

privates.name: Deluxe Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Ground-floor room with queen bed, air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV, microwave, toaster, kettle, and private parking at your door. Ideal for solo travellers or couples. Please note: pets are not allowed in this room.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe 3 Bed Family Room Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Comfortable ground-floor room with queen bed, air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV, microwave, toaster, kettle, and private parking. Ideal for solo travellers or couples travelling with pets. Designated pet area available onsite.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Superior 3 Bed Family Room Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Ground-floor studio featuring a king bed and a single bed, kitchenette with microwave, toaster, and kettle, air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV, and private parking. Ideal for business travellers or couples with one child. Pets are not allowed.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Family Room Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Spacious ground-floor apartment near the pool, ideal for families. Includes microwave, toaster, kettle, air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV, and private parking. Pets are not allowed in this apartment.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Superior 4 Bed Family Room Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Elegant ground-floor suite with 2 king beds, 2 bathrooms, fan, air conditioning, full-size fridge, free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV, microwave, toaster, kettle, and private covered parking. Ideal for space and comfort. Pets are not allowed in this suite.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 22:59 3rd Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 22:59 3rd Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
